name: Volare Helicopters
about: Volare Helicopters, located in Southern Arizona, offers comprehensive flight training and sightseeing tours. Established in 2015, we provide courses from Private Pilot to Certified Flight Instructor and Instrument Ratings, using a 4-seat Robinson R44 helicopter. Our students enjoy breathtaking views of the Sonoran Desert while gaining valuable high-density altitude experience. We also offer photo flights, aerial services, and tours of Saguaro National Park, Tucson Mountains, and Mt. Lemmon. With a strong commitment to safety and excellence, Volare Helicopters is dedicated to transforming beginners into professional pilots in as little as 12 months. Join us to embark on a journey to the skies with precision and confidence.
